lines: 1. Worthy, worthy is the Lamb, Worthy, worthy is the Lamb; Worthy, worthy is the Lamb That was slain.
Refrain : Glory, hallelujah! Praise Him, hallelujah! Glory, hallelujah To the Lamb!
2. Saviour, let Thy kingdom come! Now the power of sin consume; Bring Thy blest millennium, Holy Lamb.
3. Thus may we each moment feel, Love Him, serve Him, praise Him still Till we all on Zion's hill See the Lamb
